name: Meownster
description:
Do NOT leave unattended items! (The cat is a monster!)

The pitiful humans have gone to sleep which means its the purrfect time to redecorate the house to align with your personal sense of style! Navigate the room pushing and swatting household items around and knocking them off their stands. Score more points by dropping heavier and larger items from higher heights. But be careful though, the heavier the object and higher the ledge, the louder the crash. And too many crashes might wake the humans up before you've had your fun.

Controls:
A/D or Left/Right Arrows to Move
S or Down Arrow to Drop
Space or Up Arrow to Jump
Left Control to Swat
